title: Cloud Solution Architect
description:
Antingen är du redan arkitekt eller molnutvecklare med en stark önskan att bli arkitekt? Det viktigast är dock att du är passionerad och brinner för moderna lösningar som utnyttjar molnets alla positiva egenskaper. Vi söker just nu lösningsarkitekter till vårt team i Stockholm.
   

  

**Teamet och inriktningen**
 Teamet fokuserar på att hjälpa våra kunder forma arkitektur och arbetssätt för att nyttja molnet effektivt för att lösa de behov som finns i verksamheten. Det kan handla om övergripande arkitekturprinciper och mer teknisk arkitektur för specifika lösningar. Teamet specialiserar sig också på modern applikationsintegration och kommunikation mellan lösningar, främst med API och event-plattformar. Vi och våra kunder arbetar med alla stora molnplattformar - AWS, GCP och Azure.Kunduppdragen kommer att vara i Stockholm, samtidigt som en global organisation som Capgemini ger dig möjlighet att samarbeta, utvecklas och växa med kollegor och kunder världen över.
   

  

 I teamet specialiserar vi oss för att kunna ge stöd till våra kunders cloud och integrationsbehov i ett anta områden, t.ex:
   

  

* Applikationsdesign och arkitektur i molnmiljöer
* Integrationer för molnbaserade tjänster
* Cloud DevOps och DevSecOps
* Lösningsarkitektur


 Med både bredd och djup erbjuder vi stora möjligheter att bygga vidare på dina arkitekturfärdigheter, dela kunskap och utveckla dig tillsammans med skickliga kollegor i teamet.
   

  

**Din profil**
* Du har tidigare erfarenhet av utveckling av lösningar i public cloud eller molnbaserade containermiljö.
* Du är lösningsarkitekt med erfarenhet inom Azure, AWS eller GCP och kan bevisa det med motsvarande certifiering
* Du har god kommunikations- och presentationsförmåga i kombination med förmåga att leda och vilja att ta ansvar för kundleveranser
* Du skriver och talar flytande svenska då det används i det dagliga arbetet


**Meriterande**
* Back-end erfarenhet inom följande: Python, Node.js, Django och Spring
* Front-end erfarenhet inom följande: Angular, React.js, vue.js och jquery
* DevOps – Till exempel Ansible, Terraform, Jenkins, Kubernetes


  

  

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas**
 Vi erbjuder dig en dynamisk arbetsmiljö med andra molnspecialister inom Capgemini. Här får du möjligheten att arbeta i projekt med nationella och internationella kunder. Du har friheten att utveckla dig själv med hjälp av Capgeminis egen utbildningsplattform som bl.a. ger dig tillgång till all molnrelaterad utbildning. Berätta om dina ambitioner och vi ser fram emot att hjälpa dig att nå dem.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
* En positiv arbetsmiljö med starkt fokus på innovation och kompetens. Du kommer att arbeta med många av de senaste tekniktrenderna och vara omgiven av duktiga kollegor.
* På Capgemini blir du en del av en global organisation med starkt kundfokus, samarbetskultur och möjlighet till kontinuerligt lärande och utveckling.
* Vårt Cloud & Application Integration-team i Stockholm består av drygt 10 kollegor som arbetar som cloud och integrations-specialister hos våra kunder.
* Capgemini har varit en dominerande aktör inom arkitekturområdet sedan 90-talet, med vårt eget ramverk Integrated Architecture Framework (IAF) och vi bidrar även aktivt till vidareutvecklingen av TOGAF.
* Vi har ett aktivt, globalt arkitektforum med lokala undergrupper där du kan dra nytta av globala och lokala experter inom arkitektur och även bidra med din egen erfarenhet.


**Våra värderingar**
* Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team spirit, Modesty and Fun


**Ansökan**
* Vi rekryterar löpande till denna roll, så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.


  

  

**Om Capgemini**
 Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2023 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro.
   

  

**Get The Future You Want |** 
 www.capgemini.com

title: Application Security Consultant
job_function: Project Management, General Business, and Management
description:
**About Accenture Security**
**Be yourself,** 
**Influence the future**
**Are you ready to take your skills to a new level?**
 At Accenture, working days are never the same and that´s why we have fun here! This is a great opportunity to build a rewarding career at
 **Accenture Security.** 
 With us, you get to work in a relaxed bold team, with talented and supportive colleagues. We support your individual skills in an engaging work community where everyone is allowed to be themselves. We believe in inclusion and diversity and supporting the whole person. At Accenture, you get to work on customer projects at the world´s leading companies. Accenture is a leading global consulting company that provides services in strategy, consulting, digitalization, technology, and outsourcing. With experience, specialized expertise, global resources, and extensive industry expertise. Accenture works at the business and technology level to help customers increase their performance and develop sustainable value for their stakeholders. With over 700.000 employees and customers in more than 120 countries, Accenture drives innovation for a simplified everyday life. We are currently looking to recruit
 **Application Security Experts** 
 to be a part of our global security community
 **.**
**What We Are Looking For**
- Bachelor's or Master’s degree in IT/Information Technology/Computer Science.

- Minimum 4 years of work experience within the cyber security field.

- Deep experience with secure software development, application security and/or DevSecOps.

- Experience with cloud solutions such as Azure, AWS, GCP and/or infrastructure.

- Experience in engaging directly with technical representatives from clients during system development.

- Familiarity with standards, regulations, and frameworks such as: OWASP, OIDC, OAuth, XACML, or GDPR.

- Proficient in both spoken and written Swedish (or other Scandinavian languages), as well as English.

**Nice to have**
- Developer skills in areas such as Java, Spring framework, NodeJS, microservices architecture, Docker, Kubernetes, microservices, and more.

- Hands-on experience from security tools like Veracode, Splunk, Snyk, or similar.

- Relevant certifications: CCSK, CISSP, CSSLP, or similar.

- Current or former Norwegian security personnel clearance.

- Experience in leading projects and/or technical teams.

**Life at Accenture**
 Throughout your time at Accenture, we do not only offer our people the training they need but also expect them to take the time to learn and grow in a culture of continuous improvement. As you progress through your career in the path you choose, you will move more and more towards a leadership role in the truest sense of the word. Leaders lead by respect, knowledge and by helping those more junior than themselves. You will also be assigned a career counselor over time.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We offer and inclusive and inspiring work environment with access to our global network and ample training opportunities. You will be able to develop your skills within security and grow both personally and professionally. Our projects are built on cooperation and teamwork, and you will find yourself teaming with other talented, passionate and dedicated consultants, all working towards a shared goal. Some of our benefits:
   

  

  

- Accenture Sweden employees are entitled to minimum of 5 weeks of vacation every year.

- All employees in Accenture have a pension saving plan.

- Health Insurance

- Health Allowance at 5000 SEK per year

- Within Accenture, you are encouraged to do trainings related to your profession, to develop your skills.

 We also offer:
   

  

  

- A unique opportunity to use technical knowledge to contribute to innovation and socially changing projects – Accenture has a large customer portfolio across all industries. Which brings with it many exciting opportunities!

- Great professional challenges and a unique opportunity to apply your expertise and work on projects that matter to you and the society.

- Everyone in Accenture has a dedicated internal career counsellor and sparring partner with whom you can discuss personal development in confidence.

- Good bonus schemes, competitive salary, minimum 5 weeks of vacation, health insurance, pension schemes, share savings program and parental leave covered beyond NAV’s terms and conditions up to 12G.

- A packed social calendar for those interested. We have regular beer, board game night, watch handball match, play volleyball, go surfing, play chess and go cross-country skiing, etc

**We look forward to learning more about you!** 
 Apply online, attach your CV and letter of application in English. If you have any questions, please contact responsible recruiter: karl.kego@accenture.com

title: Senior Network Cloud Architect
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Want to embark on a new career journey where you can make a real impact?
   

  

 I’m Giovanni Mumolo, and I’m looking for a passionate and talented individual ready to shape the future of network infrastructure. Join our dynamic team at Telia, where your expertise will flourish, and together – let’s make better happen!
   

  

**As a Senior Network Cloud Architect, you’ll...**
 be a vital part of Telia's Network Common Infrastructure organization, managing Telia’s telco Cloud for internal customers. Within the Software Development Team, you'll lead the architecture and integration of our Cloud software and tooling stack.
   

  

 Your mission will be to enhance our IaaS services, supporting both VNF and CNF in Sweden, Finland, and Norway. You’ll drive automation for infrastructure resource life cycles and develop solutions that empower tenant applications. Working with a mix of in-house systems and Broadcom/VMware stacks, you’ll shape the future of our tooling and automation strategies. This is a unique opportunity to collaborate across borders and make a tangible impact.
   

  

**Who we're looking for:**
 The ideal candidate has a strong blend of software development and operational expertise in IaaS. You bring significant experience as a DevOps engineer in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure, or private clouds). You have deep knowledge of Kubernetes, infrastructure as code, and CI/CD pipeline orchestration tools like GitHub Actions, Ansible, and Terraform. Proficiency in programming (Python or Java) and familiarity with monitoring tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana) will help you succeed. A background in network engineering within cloud environments is a plus.
   

  

 You’re a lifelong learner with excellent communication skills, ready to collaborate with tenants and internal teams. If you're proficient in English and have a passion for building innovative solutions, you’re exactly who we need.
   

  

**We are more than a workplace**
 Join our inclusive team and collaborate with over 15,000 talented colleagues from around the globe. Recognized as a Climate Leader in the Nordics and Baltics, we're passionate about creating great products and delivering extraordinary customer experiences while always prioritizing sustainability. We believe our people are our most valuable asset, ensuring everyone feels welcome and valued. When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn an annual bonus based on your performance and Telia's results. If you want to make a real impact, this is the place where you belong.
   

  

**Ready to make better happen?**
 We are looking forward to your application by 2025-01-31. If you are selected for the next stage in the process, you'll be contacted by our Talent Acquisition Partner or Hiring Manager. Required controls will be performed.
   

  

 If you want to know more about this position, please contact Giovanni Mumolo at giovanni.mumolo@teliacompany.com.
   

  

**Join us and let’s make better happen – together!**

title: Commercial Sales Engineer - Nordics
description:
Build the future of the AI Data Cloud. Join the Snowflake team.
   

  

 Build the future of the AI Data Cloud. Join the Snowflake team.
   

  

 We are looking for a Commercial Sales Engineer for the Nordics market who can solve our customer’s most complex problems. In this role you will work directly with the account sales team and channel partners to understand the needs of our customers, strategize on how to best support them in their evaluation and ultimately help our customers choose Snowflake as their solution.
   

  

 As a Snowflake Commercial Sales Engineer you share our passion for solving complex data challenges and helping organizations to get the most out of their data assets. Our technical landscape is ever evolving and you are keen to learn new skills and put them into practice on real world challenges. You are able to translate features and functions into solutions that solve business problems, in conversations with technical or business teams, with end users or executives.
   

  

 In this role you will get to:
   

  

* Present Snowflake’s technology and vision to executives and technical contributors at prospects and customers
* Work hands-on with prospects and customers to demonstrate and communicate the value of Snowflake technology throughout the sales cycle, from demo to proof of concept to design and implementation
* Create and develop technical champions in your accounts to drive deals and achieve a technical win
* Be at the cutting edge of Snowflake technology and confidently present Snowflake roadmap features and functionality to customers and/or prospects
* Immerse and enable yourself in the ever-evolving industry, maintaining a deep understanding of competitive and complementary technologies and vendors and how to position Snowflake in relation to them
* Work closely with other sales engineers to make each other the best and constantly learn from wins and losses
* Collaborate with Product Management, Engineering, and Marketing to continuously improve Snowflake’s products and marketing
* Represent Snowflake at industry or customer events
* Work with our ecosystem and implementation partners to build joint architectures or collaborate on account strategies and initiatives to help our customers be successful


 On day one we will expect you to have:
   

  

* Sales engineering/solution architect experience in a SaaS environment or relevant industry experience (analytics, data science, data engineering etc)
* Outstanding presentation skills to both technical and executive audiences, whether impromptu on a whiteboard or using presentations and demos
* Understanding of and experience with data architecture, data analytics and cloud technology
* Hands on experience with SQL
* Ability to solve customer specific business problems and apply Snowflake’s solutions
* Customer-facing skills to effectively communicate our vision to a wide variety of technical and executive audiences both written and verbal


 Preferred (but not required) to have:
   

  

* Hands on experience with Python
* Experience working with modern data technology (e.g. dbt, spark, containers, devops tooling, orchestration tools, git, etc.)
* Experience with data science and machine learning technology


 People want to buy from people who understand them. Our Sales Engineers build connections, relationships and trust with our customers that last. We love to learn, are open to giving and receiving feedback and are passionate about making our customers and each other successful.
   

  

 Think you have what it takes but not sure that you tick every box above? Apply anyways! We value the broad range of experience our teams bring to the table and believe our customers are more successful because of it.
   

  

 Snowflake is growing fast, and we’re scaling our team to help enable and accelerate our growth. We are looking for people who share our values, challenge ordinary thinking, and push the pace of innovation while building a future for themselves and Snowflake.
   

  

 How do you want to make your impact?

title: Forskningsingenjör i maskininlärning och artificiell intelligens
description:
**Vill du bidra till medicinsk forskning av toppkvalitet?**
 Som forskningsingenjör hos oss får du chansen att arbeta med MoodMon-projektet – ett EU-finansierat initiativ som kombinerar avancerad AI och patientövervakning för att revolutionera behandlingen av kroniska affektiva störningar. Du blir en del av ett dynamiskt team som utvecklar banbrytande teknik för att förutsäga och förebygga maniska episoder.
   

  

 Denna tjänst är tidsbegränsad till 12 månader.
   

  

**Din roll**
 Som forskningsingenjör kommer du att bidra till MoodMon-projektet. MoodMon är ett AI-drivet patientövervakningsverktyg utformat för att förbättra behandlingen av kroniska affektiva störningar. Verktyget möjliggör kontinuerlig och objektiv övervakning för att stödja patienter, deras familjer och vårdgivare. Systemet förutspår maniska episoder och andra förändringar i mentala tillstånd, vilket förbättrar behandlingens effektivitet och minskar vårdkostnaderna. Kliniska studier har visat att MoodMon uppnår hög känslighet och specificitet. Vår roll är att vidareutveckla denna digitala medicintekniska produkt samt utforska AI-certifieringsmekanismer som möjliggör omträning av modellen utan att hela produkten behöver certifieras på nytt.
   

  

 I projektet kommer du bidra med:
   

  

* Utveckla och underhålla AI-baserade patientövervakningssystem
* Stödja prediktiva funktioner för episoder vid affektiva störningar
* Samarbeta med tvärvetenskapliga team för att säkerställa praktiska och effektfulla lösningar
* Dokumentera tekniskt arbete och delta i workshops eller kunskapsdelningsaktiviteter


**Vem är du?**
 För att bli anställd som forskningsingenjör har du en civilingenjörs- eller masterexamen inom datavetenskap, mjukvaruutveckling eller liknande.
   

  

 Vidare har du:
   

  

* Kunskap om maskininlärningsramverk och naturlig språkbearbetning (NLP)
* Erfarenhet av verktyg som GitHub
* Starka samarbets- och kommunikationsförmågor, särskilt i tvärvetenskapliga team
* Goda kunskaper i engelska och svenska


 Meriterande är även:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av Python och Flask. Kunskap om webbutvecklingstekniker (t.ex. JavaScript och D3.js)
* Erfarenhet från hälso- och sjukvårdsområdet eller AI-baserade system
* Bakgrund inom människa-datorinteraktion. Förståelse för DevOps-processer


**Vad erbjuder vi?**
 En kreativ, internationell och inspirerande miljö fylld av kompetens och nyfikenhet. Karolinska Institutet är ett av världens ledande medicinska universitet. Vår vision är att driva utvecklingen av kunskap om livet och verka för en bättre hälsa för alla. Här bedriver vi framgångsrik medicinsk forskning och har det största utbudet av medicinska utbildningar i Sverige. Som universitet är Karolinska Institutet en statlig myndighet. Det gör att du får goda förmåner genom vårt kollektivavtal. Medarbetare på KI erbjuds också möjlighet till ett flexibelt arbetssätt. Det innebär att om den verksamhet du jobbar i tillåter, så kan du arbeta en del av din arbetstid på distans. Du får även träna fritt i våra moderna friskvårdsanläggningar där utbildad personal finns på plats.
   

  

**Placering:** 
 Flemingsberg
   

  

*Tio skäl att välja Karolinska Institutet*
**Ansökan**
 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan senast den 22 januari 2025.
   

  

 Ansökan ska göras via rekryteringssystemet Varbi. I denna rekrytering söker du med ditt CV utan personligt brev. I ansökningsformuläret kommer du istället att få svara på några frågor om varför du söker jobbet.
   

  

 Vid tillsvidareanställning tillämpar Karolinska Institutet 6 månaders provanställning.
   

  

**Vill du göra skillnad – och bidra till en bättre hälsa för alla? Sök jobb hos oss**
 Anställningsform: särskild visstidsanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Huddinge | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: STÖD 2-5174/2024 | Kontakt: Fernando Seoane Martinez 0852483903, | Facklig företrädare: Henry Wölling, SEKO henry.wolling@ki.se, Taher Darreh-Shori, SACO taher.darreh-shori@ki.se, Carina Eklund, OFR 08-58582665, | Publicerat: 2025-01-08 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-01-22

title: Senior ASIC Design Engineer
description:
Senior ASIC Design Engineer


Swedium Global is the growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.


Location: Sweden/Remote


Expected Start date: ASAP


Job Description: ASIC Design Engineer


Are you looking for the next step within ASIC design ?


We are currently looking for an ASIC designer. You will be involved in new and existing ASIC projects working in teams. The team is currently working on a mix of IP design/verification and different level of SubSys integration/verification.


Knowledge and experience:


* You have a solid background with more than 5+ years of experience of ASIC development


* Used to work with complex ASIC and/or large FPGA design


* Multi clock domains


* System Verilog


* Good English skills, in both speech and writing

  


Meritorious if you have:


* Experience of systemization and architecture design


* Leadership qualities


* Backend work with timing constraints, timing optimization and formal verification


* UVM verification


* Scripting skills


* Spyglass


* Telecommunication


Additional information

  


You can reach out to us at Pratik.pandey@swediumglobal.com or careers@swediumglobal.com


  
Job Overview


* Location : Stockholm, Sweden
* Vacancy : 1
* Key Skills : ASIC Design, Verliog

title: Senior ASIC Design Engineer
description:
Swedium Global is the growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.

**Location:** Sweden

**Expected Start date:** ASAP

**Job Name :** Senior ASIC Design Engineer

**Role.**

* Create advanced, power-efficient digital blocks using SystemVerilog or VHDL, maintaining high precision, scalability and reliability standards.
* Collaborate with system architects to define and implement groundbreaking microarchitectures that drive performance and efficiency.
* Partner with verification engineers in a continuous feedback loop to ensure robust and high-quality designs.
* Collaborate closely with backend teams to achieve timing closure and enhance designs for optimal power and performance.

**Skills:**

* Demonstrated proficiency in ASIC digital design using SystemVerilog or VHDL, backed by several years of hands-on experience.
* Experience of debugging, linting, synthesis tools, timing closure, power, and optimization challenges.
* Proven track record in micro-architecture/systemisation, showcasing your ability to conceptualise and implement complex designs.
* Technical problem-solving skills, an aptitude for creative solutions, capturing opportunities and being able to write maintainable code.
* Collaborative mindset, fostering teamwork, give and receive feedback, eager to learn and communication skills.
* Understanding agile way of working, source control and continuous integration tools, preferable experience of using GIT and Jenkins.
* A Master of Science degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or an equivalent qualification.

**You can reach out to us at Pratik.pandey@swediumglobal.com or deepthi.meka@swediumglobal.com or hr@swediumglobal.com**

title: Cyber Security Manager - Team Manager for Cyber Security Architecture Team
description:
**Job Description**  

To provide a secure, trustworthy, and always available experience to our customers, we are now transforming the way we address the continuously evolving and complex cyber security threats and risks. To do this we have created a new Tech Centre focused solely on managing Cyber Security for all our brands and majority investments. Within this Cyber Security Tech Centre, we have a unit that focuses on Cyber Security Architecture & Engineering, with the mission to protect our customers, colleagues, and company by establishing and managing safe and secure technology use and at the same time path the way forward for our Cyber Security Architecture.


This is a unique opportunity to lead our Cyber Security Architecture team, to drive our delivery and services portfolio throughout the whole H&M Group and all our brands. You will report to the Head of Cyber Security Architecture & Engineering Unit.


We are looking for a strong **Manager** and principal leader.

**Responsibilities**:

* Manage day-to-day activities of the Cyber Security Architecture team, ensuring operational and performance objectives are met.
* Spear-head team-level budgeting, planning, and roadmap initiatives.
* Cultivate professional development within the team to ensure relevant skills and qualifications.
* Contribute to the Cyber Security strategy and ensure team alignment.
* Contextualize corporate strategic vision, conducting analysis, identifying opportunities, and defining strategic activities in the Cyber Security domain.
* Analyze, design, develop, and maintain roadmaps and implementation plans to enable future-state security capabilities, ensuring organizational resilience, stability, and operational excellence.
* Drive continuous improvement and simplification to enhance end-to-end business value, collaborating across the organization to lower the total cost of ownership.
* Develop control mechanisms to manage Cyber risks in alignment with business risk appetite.
* Act as a facilitator for complex technical topics, collaborating across functions to ensure comprehensive consultation.

  

**Qualifications**  

What you need to succeed:

* Experience in multiple cyber security areas, e.g. Device security, Application security, Data security, Cloud security, Network security, Secure development, and IAM.
* Demonstrated skills and experience in information security within an international and diverse context.
* Previous leadership experience of a senior team, with up to seven direct reports
* Proven experience and a structured approach to KPI and OKR driven deliveries, and alignment to other organisational units
* Leadership understanding of team dynamics and staff personal development.
* A bachelor's degree in a related field.
* Preferred certifications: CISSP, CISM, CompTia Security+, Identity Management Institute (IMI) certifications.
* Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively within a non-hierarchical culture of

  

**Additional Information** **Benefits**  

We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.

*In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.*

**Inclusion & Diversity**  

*H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organisation. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.*

*We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.*

**Company Description**  

H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way. Learn more about H&M here.
company_description: At H&M, we welcome you to be yourself and challenge you to grow and make a difference. Help us reimagine the future of an entire industry, making everyone look, feel & do good.

title: Advertising Solutions Architect, gTech Ads LCS
description:
**Minimum qualifications:**  

* Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.
* 5 years of experience in a technical project management or a customer-facing role.
* Experience in building proof of concepts using web/scripting technologies (e.g., JavaScript, Python, etc.) and SQL databases.


**Preferred qualifications:**  

* Master’s degree in Business, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Engineering or Applied Science, or a related field.
* Experience in online advertising technology, online measurement, Google Video and Display products, data integration and cloud technologies.
* Knowledge of key trends and business issues related to digital.
* Ability to understand technical concepts and communicate them to a non-technical audience.
* Excellent relationship building, relationship management, stakeholder management and Influencing skills.
* Excellent problem-solving, analysis, and communication skills.


About the job
  
  

gTech Ads Large Customer Sales (LCS) Tech team takes a creative, collaborative, and customer-centric approach to provide foundational services and forward-looking business solutions to top advertiser and publisher customers. Through technical implementation, optimization, and key solutions, gTech Ads LCS Tech team helps customers attain their business goals while building long-term capabilities.
  
As an Advertising Solutions Architect (ASA), you will create an excellent experience for Google’s Ads clients by being accountable for gTech service delivery and enabling sales objectives for particular product area. You will serve as a unified service partner who designs and delivers gTech Ads LCS solution and services.
  
Google creates products and services that make the world a better place, and gTech’s role is to help bring them to life. Our teams of trusted advisors support customers globally. Our solutions are rooted in our technical skill, product expertise, and a thorough understanding of our customers’ complex needs. Whether the answer is a bespoke solution to solve a unique problem, or a new tool that can scale across Google, everything we do aims to ensure our customers benefit from the full potential of Google products.To learn more about gTech, check out ourvideo.
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

* Advise Google’s Ads clients by understanding how Video and Display solutions can address their business issues, by acting as a collaborative and inclusive thought partner, architecting solutions and services plans to accomplish their goals, and effectively delivering on, technical, global projects.
* Discover customer needs by understanding clients annual and quarterly issues/goals in collaboration with sales, assessing and prioritizing where gTech Ads can add value and drive uplift, and securing senior client buy-in.
* Participate in ideation and design of a joint services plan by aligning solutions to client focus areas. Unlock new opportunities for growth by scoping projects.
* Deliver services and solutions working closely with other gTech Ads execution teams in region and media solutions.
* Conduct regular debriefs with clients and Sales Teams, gathering insights on clients business objectives.

description:

* Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
* 10 years of experience in technical project management, stakeholder management, solution engineering or technical consulting, and 4 years of experience in technical leadership.
* Experience building integrations using Python, Node.js, Go, or Java.

In this role, you will assist customers with an end-to-end application that combines our most advanced conversational AI, with multimodal and omnichannel functionality to deliver exceptional customer experiences at every touchpoint. In this role, you will grow the adoption of Customer Engagement in EMEA by virtue of your experience in building conversational applications.

Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.

title: Cloud Architect AWS
description:
**Description du poste:**
-------------------------


Anser du, som oss, att framtiden ligger i molnet? r du erfaren inom omrdet och brinner du fr att designa och implementera cloudlsningar? I s fall r det dig vi sker!  

  

Vi sker dig som r driven, positiv och en stjrna inom cloud. Hos oss kommer du f mjligheten att jobba med Norges och Sveriges mest spnnande kunder och projekt. Vi tror att du trivs i konsultrollen och har starkt kundfokus.  

  

CGI leder digitaliseringen i Sverige och Norge och r vrldsledande p att omvandla innovation, information och teknologi till framgng fr vra kunder. Vi r ett globalt fretag med lokal nrvaro, finns i 40 lnder med 88 000 medarbetare varav nrmare 5000 i Sverige och p 30 orter. Kombinationen av global och lokala nrvaro ger njda kunder men ppnar ocks upp fr mnga och flexibla utvecklingsvgar fr vra anstllda.  

  

Placering: Gteborgsomrdet


**Fonctions et responsabilits:**
--------------------------------


I rollen som Cloud Architect kommer exempelvis jobba med en ledande aktr inom fordonstillverkning.
  

  

Du kommer att designa, utveckla och frvalta skra, skalbara och dynamiska lsningar med hg tillgnglighet fr att skapa frutsttningar fr vra kunder att uppn sina affrsml. Utver ditt engagemang hos vra kunder kommer du f stora mjligheter att frdjupa dig inom verktyg, tekniker och metoder fr nnu lite vassare inom omrdet.  

  

Du kommer att arbeta med kollegor som r bland de vassaste inom omrdet fr data, analys och cloud, men ven med kollegor frn resterande enheter inom bolaget. CGI har kompetens som strcker sig frn management och projektledning till design och utveckling. CGI har ven ett globalt ntverk som gr att du kommer f tillgng till en enorm kunskaps- och erfarenhetsbank. Du kommer helt enkelt f chansen att bli en del av ett av marknadens bredaste och mest konkurrenskraftiga bolag.


**Qualits requises pour russir dans ce rle:**
---------------------------------------------


Vi sker dig om har deltagit i ett flertal verksamhetsnra projekt, i rollen som cloud arkitekt eller solution lead. Vi ser att du har goda kunskaper inom bde Enterprise-arkitektur och Cloud. Dina erfarenheter gr att du r van att fnga och dokumentera kundens behov, driva workshops, designa och rekommendera lsningar samt att implementera lsningar. Du har troligen ett antal relevanta certifieringar.  

  

Vi ser grna att du matchar flera av nedanstende kvalifikationer:  

  

+10 rs som IT-konsult och minst 4 rs arbetslivserfarenhet som arkitekt.
  

Har goda kunskaper i AWS + tillhrande teknologier.  

Du har ett starkt driv, r bekvm i konsultrollen och har ett starkt kundfokus  

Talar och skriver engelska och svenska obehindrat.  

Arbeta med utveckling. Bygg test-, QA- och produktionsmiljer.  

#LI-HL6  

  

Fr att du ska lyckas hos oss krvs en stark vilja och ett mod att vga utvecklas. Vidare krvs att du trivs i en ppen kultur dr lrande, sammanhllning och trivsel str i centrum.  

  

Vad vi erbjuder:  

P CGI vet vi att framgng r att g framt tillsammans. Vi vet att vgen till framgng gr via tillit och samarbete. Vi bygger inte bara framgng och stolthet, varje dag bygger vi varandra vra kunder och vr verksamhet. CGI grundades just s, genom en drm om att skapa ett fretag dr alla ska trivas och vara med att bygga framtiden. Vi hller fortfarande drmmen levande genom att uppmuntra egna initiativ och lter olika sikter ta plats eftersom vi vet att de bsta iderna fds i mtet mellan olika infallsvinklar.  

  

Vill du jobba tillsammans med oss?  

Vi ser fram emot att hra frn dig! Om det fortfarande finns ngot du undrar ver, skicka grna din frga till Husnia Kabiri, husnia.kabiri@cgi.com  

  

Vi hanterar anskningar lpande och personliga skerhetskrav kan komma att krvas av rollen.  

  

Insights you can act on  

Teknologin r krnan i vra kunders digitala transformation men vi vet att det r mnniskor som r krnan i ett fretags framgng.  

Nr du brjar p CGI, blir du en viktig rdgivare som tillsammans med kollegor och kunder tar fram handlingskraftiga insikter som skapar meningsfulla och hllbara resultat. Vi kallar vra anstllda fr ""medlemmar"" d de r delgare i CGI. Vi vill erbjuda vra medlemmar en kultur dr vi trivs med att jobba och utvecklas tillsammans och dr vi tillsammans bygger ett fretag att vara stolta ver. Detta har varit vr drm sedan 1976 och den har frt oss dit vi r idag en av vrldens strsta oberoende leverantrer av IT- och affrskonsulttjnster.  

  

P CGI vet vi vilken rikedom mngfald ger. Vi strvar efter att skapa en arbetskultur dr alla knner sig vlkomna och vi samarbetar med vra kunder fr att skapa ett inkluderande samhlle. Som en jmstlld arbetsgivare vill vi ge alla vra medlemmar samma mjlighet att lyckas och utvecklas.  

  

r du redo att bli en del av vr framgngsresa? Brja hos oss p CGI dr dina ider och handlingar gr skillnad.


**Comptences:**
---------------


* Adobe Creative Cloud
* Enterprise Architecture
**Ce que vous pouvez attendre de nous:**
----------------------------------------


**Lt oss som gare omvandla verklig insikt till handling tillsammans.**  

  

Livet p CGI bygger p gande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhrighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna n din fulla potential.  

  

Du r inbjuden att ta gandeskap redan frn frsta dagen i vrt arbete med att frverkliga vr drm om att skapa en arbetsmilj dr vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgngen fr vrt fretag. Det r drfr vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare n anstllda. Vi drar nytta av vr kollektiva framgng och tillsammans fr vi mjlighet att aktivt forma vr fretagsstrategi och inriktning.  

  

Ditt arbete skapar vrde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lsningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du fr tillgng till globala mjligheter att skala upp dina ider, omfamna nya mjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.  

  

Du kommer att forma din karrir tillsammans med ett fretag som r byggt fr att vxa och best. Du fr std av ledare som bryr sig om din hlsa och ditt vlbefinnande och ger dig mjligheter att frdjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
  

  

Bli en del en av vrldens strsta leverantrer av IT- och affrskonsulttjnster.

title: Konsult inom SAP
description:
**Description du poste:**
-------------------------


Knner du dig nyfiken p nya utmaningar och vill arbeta med ett affrssystem som r hjrtat i ett fretags verksamhet fr att upprtthlla produktivitet och vidareutveckling?
  

  

CGI r ett av vrldens strsta oberoende tjnstefretag inom IT och affrsprocesser och vi har ett nra samarbete med SAP som Guldpartner. P den svenska marknaden r vi en av de strsta SAP-leverantrerna, med en aktiv nationell SAP Practise dr vi utbyter kunskap och erfarenhet med varandra.  

  

Nu sker en renssans inom SAP med SAP S/4HANA Cloud, SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP), Embedded Analytics och digitalisering. Det innebr att fretag som anvnder SAP str infr helt nya utmaningar och mjligheter. Vi sker nu erfarna SAP-applikationskonsulter till vrt hrliga team i Malm!


**Fonctions et responsabilits:**
--------------------------------


I rollen som konsult inom SAP hos oss fr du mjlighet att vara en viktig kugge i CGI:s leverans gentemot uppdragsgivare dr du ingr i ett team med kunniga och skna kollegor. Hr fr du mjlighet att hjlpa vra kunder effektivisera och utveckla sina affrsprocesser med hjlp av de mjligheter SAP som affrssystem ger. Vrt erbjudande strcker sig ver omrden som bland annat S/4HANA, S/4HANA Cloud, SuccessFactors, Signavio, Ariba, och Concur. Vi arbetar med implementationsprojekt, processfrbttringar och frvaltningsuppdrag inom olika industrier.  

  

Vi jobbar ven med kunder som nnu inte tagit steget till den nya SAP-plattformen.  

  

I vrt team finns det goda utvecklingsmjligheter och det r bara du sjlv som stter grnsen fr hur lngt du vill utvecklas. Vi satsar p vra konsulter och lgger stort fokus p att vra medarbetare mr bra.


**Qualits requises pour russir dans ce rle:**
---------------------------------------------


Vi sker dig som r SAP-konsult eller har arbetat som SAP key user. I rollen har du deltagit eller drivit utvecklings- och/eller frndringsprojekt.  

  

Om du inte redan arbetat med det nya frn SAP r det viktigt att du r nyfiken p det och beredd att gra en kompetensresa.  

  

Vi ser grna att du har fljande kompetens eller erfarenhet:  

Relevant hgskoleutbildning eller motsvarande  

svenska och engelska obehindrad i tal och skrift  

  

Det r meriterande om du har erfarenhet eller ett brinnande intresse fr ett eller flera av fljande processomrden:  

  

o Finans och Controlling (FI/CO)  

o Produktion (PP)  

o Logistik (MM, WM, EWM, SD)  

o Underhll (PM)  

o CRM  

o Utveckling (ABAP)  

o BTP
  

o Analytics  

o RPA  

o Integration  

o User Experience (Fiori, Neptune)  

  

Fr denna roll lgger vi stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.  

Rollen som konsult innebr en omvxlande vardag dr du behver ha en frmga och drivkraft att bygga och utveckla goda relationer fr att skapa ett starkt samarbete.  

  

Fr att framgngsrikt kunna lsa de utmaningar som du och ditt team stlls infr sker vi dig med ett analytiskt tnk och kreativ problemlsningsfrmga. Som konsult hos oss ser vi att du har en affrsmssig instllning, ett stort eget driv och att du gillar utmaningar!  

  

Tjnsten r en heltidstjnst med placering i Malm.  

  

Vi ser fram emot att hra frn dig! Om du har ngra frgor eller funderingar kontakta grna:  

Rekryterande chef Carl Nordin, carl.nordin@cgi.com
  

  

#LI-DNI


**Ce que vous pouvez attendre de nous:**
----------------------------------------


**Lt oss som gare omvandla verklig insikt till handling tillsammans.**  

  

Livet p CGI bygger p gande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhrighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna n din fulla potential.  

  

Du r inbjuden att ta gandeskap redan frn frsta dagen i vrt arbete med att frverkliga vr drm om att skapa en arbetsmilj dr vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgngen fr vrt fretag. Det r drfr vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare n anstllda. Vi drar nytta av vr kollektiva framgng och tillsammans fr vi mjlighet att aktivt forma vr fretagsstrategi och inriktning.  

  

Ditt arbete skapar vrde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lsningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du fr tillgng till globala mjligheter att skala upp dina ider, omfamna nya mjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.  

  

Du kommer att forma din karrir tillsammans med ett fretag som r byggt fr att vxa och best. Du fr std av ledare som bryr sig om din hlsa och ditt vlbefinnande och ger dig mjligheter att frdjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
  

  

Bli en del en av vrldens strsta leverantrer av IT- och affrskonsulttjnster.

title: Execution Contracts Manager
description:
**Overview*** Microsoft Cloud Operations and Innovation (CO+I) is the team behind the cloud. We are responsible for delivering over 200 Microsoft web portals, Live and Online Services around the world including infrastructure, security and compliance, operations, globalization, and manageability. Our focus is on smart growth, high efficiency, and delivering a trusted experience to customers and partners worldwide. We are looking for a passionate, high-energy individual to help build the network that powers the world’s largest online services.
* Within CO+I, the Contracts Management team is responsible for establishing a construction services supply chain that can meet and deliver services to support the ever-growing growth of the Cloud and our customers. We support a portfolio of complex, multi-disciplinary, multi-billion, multi-year datacenter construction projects.
* We are looking to fill a critical role of **Execution Contracts** **Manager** to lead the procurement and contracts management of multiple data center build projects in Sweden as we continue to develop our build program across the Europe Middle East Africa (EMEA) region.
* In alignment with our Microsoft values, we are committed to cultivating an inclusive work environment for all employees to positively impact our culture every day.
* “Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.”

**Responsibilities**
--------------------

**Responsibilities** **Category Experience:*** Deep Construction Execution Experience in Supply Chain and Contracts Management is an absolute requirement for this role.
* Experience in more key construction categories including Architect / Engineering consultancy, Infrastructure Equipment and construction services would be of benefit too.
* Experience on large-scale mission critical construction projects is an absolute requirement - sourcing, managing, and administering contracts over USD $100M.
* Strong negotiation skills, ability to lead a cross functional team in the development of negotiation plans to drive positive outputs.

 **Behavioral Attributes:*** Can create clarity, generate energy, and deliver success; always be planning for the future.
* Have high integrity – must be ethical and strong value-based individual focused on fairness and maintaining confidentiality.
* Bring high energy – a drive to achieve results in midst of ambiguity and a matrix organization.
* Be a high performer – be able to fit the Microsoft “culture” by effectively multi-tasking and managing priorities; have a “sense of urgency” regarding issue resolution.
* Understand the importance of relationships inside the company and with our supply chain partners.

**Procurement Planning:** Implement procurement plans to effectively deliver against project goals on budget. **Negotiation:** Implement appropriate negotiation strategies for the specified scope, incorporating cross functional perspectives as necessary to build a holistic plan together with clear allocation of roles and responsibilities. **Supplier Selection:** Participate in supplier selection and performance management; ensure alignment to Microsoft business goals throughout. **Contracting:** Deep understanding of industry contracting norms and ability to rapidly develop understanding of Microsoft contracting requirements; Lead / participate in negotiation of contracts that meet business goals. **Contract Oversight:** Monitor key elements of supplier performance to contracted requirements; implement corrective action and lessons learned. Manage the administration of the contract with our stakeholders as the Subject Matter Expert and the appointed person to manage all notices, changes, claims and other Contractual Matters. **Project Management:** Develop and implement plans to effectively deliver goods and services on time and within specification while managing risk. **Continuous Improvement:** Always seek ways to streamline, automate, and simplify processes; includes deployment of tools, using data analytics and working with IT groups to define system requirements.**Qualifications**
------------------

**Required Qualifications**  

Master's Degree in **Quantity Surveying, Engineering,** Computer Science, **Supply Chain**, Data Analytics, Business, Finance or related field AND 5+ years experience in **Commercial / Contractual Construction Role**, Data Science/Analytics, Finance, Project Management, Supply Chain, and/or Operations OR Bachelor's Degree in **Quantity Surveying, Engineering,** Computer Science, **Supply Chain,** Data Analytics, Business, Finance or related field AND 6+ years experience in **Commercial / Contractual Construction Role,** Data Science/Analytics, Finance, Project Management, Supply Chain, and/or Operations OR equivalent experience. **Preferred Qualifications**  

Master's Degree in **Quantity Surveying, Engineering**, Computer Science, **Supply Chain**, Data Analytics, Business, Finance or related field AND 7+ years experience in **Commercial / Contractual Construction Role,** Data Science/Analytics, Finance, Project Management, Supply Chain, and/or Operations OR Bachelor's Degree in **Quantity Surveying, Engineering,** Computer Science, **Supply Chain**, Data Analytics, Business, Finance or related field AND 8+ years experience in **Commercial / Contractual Construction Role,** Data Science/Analytics, Finance, Project Management, Supply Chain, and/or Operations OR equivalent experience. **Benefits Statement**  


Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

title: Senior Firewall Expert Remote
description:
Job Description
  
Northab is seeking a highly skilled Senior Firewall Expert to join our team on a full-time basis, with the possibility of part-time work during the initial months. This is a remote position, although occasional on-site presence in locations north of Stockholm, such as Tierp, may be required.
  
Key Responsibilities
  
Take an active role in planning, documenting, and executing firewall implementation projects.
  
Collaborate with municipalities to create a unified IT environment, including a new cloud environment and shared data center.
  
Work closely with clients, project managers, and other resources to ensure successful project outcomes.
  
Contribute to the planning, documentation, and implementation phases of the project.
  
  

Required Skills and Experience
  
Extensive technical knowledge of Fortinet firewalls.
  
Experience working with municipal clients is advantageous, especially in outsourcing projects.
  
Ability to work independently while also being a team player who can collaborate closely with clients and external resources.
  
Problem-solving skills with a proactive approach to planning and execution.
  
Previous experience as a Network Expert is a plus.
  
  

Who We Are Looking For
  
We are looking for someone who is humble yet assertive, capable of taking responsibility in both planning and execution phases. You should be a problem solver and a team player who thrives in a collaborative environment.
  
About Northab
  
At Northab, we pride ourselves on being a comprehensive partner for IT project development and product innovation. We provide access to highly skilled teams and strategic expertise to meet the needs of both short-term projects and long-term product development initiatives. Our specialists are committed to delivering precise, high-quality results, supported by a holistic project management approach that ensures seamless execution from inception to commercialization.
  
Join us and focus on your core business while we manage the complexities of your development projects.

title: Internship with IPercept - Cybersecurity Intern
description:
Cybersecurity Intern
  
**Location:** preferably on site
  
**Start Date:** as soon as possible
  
Job Summary
  
We are seeking a motivated Cybersecurity Intern to gain hands-on experience in building secure, scalable solutions for cloud and edge devices. This role is perfect for a technically driven student passionate about cybersecurity, system integrity, and solving complex challenges in a collaborative environment. You'll work closely with skilled engineers on impactful projects that enhance security and reliability across our infrastructure.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

**Secure Infrastructure Development:** Assist in developing tools and systems to secure edge devices and cloud environments. Prototyping & Demos: Build and showcase demo systems for secure identity management, credential rotation, and system monitoring.
  
**Automation & Monitoring:** Create scripts and tools to automate processes, improve monitoring, and identify vulnerabilities.
  
**Research & Evaluation:** Explore open-source tools for SIEM (Security Information and Event Management), secure key storage, and system diagnostics. Test Environments: Configure local or virtualized test setups to support system development and validation.
  
  

Skills & Qualifications
  
**Technical Skills:** Solid foundation in Linux, Bash scripting, and Python. Experience with SSH, server setup, and containerization tools like Docker. Understanding of basic cybersecurity principles and eagerness to explore advanced topics. Ability to troubleshoot and problem-solve independently. Comfort using tools like ChatGPT/LLMs for efficient learning and problem-solving.
  
  

Preferred Skills
  
Knowledge of open-source monitoring tools or SIEM solutions. Familiarity with PKI (Private Key Infrastructure), certificate management, and secure credential rotation. Experience with edge device security concepts and cloud-edge integrations. Strong scripting for task automation and process improvements.
  
  

What We Offer
  
Flexible working hours tailored to student schedules. Hands-on experience with cybersecurity solutions in real-world projects. Mentorship and opportunities to collaborate with experienced engineers. Exposure to cutting-edge tools, cloud-edge systems, and emerging technologies. A supportive, innovation-driven team that values initiative and creativity.
  
To apply, please contact us at career@ipercept.io

title: E-commerce Specialist/ Online Merchandiser - Stockholm
description:
We are seeking an Online Merchandiser to join the eCommerce Experience team. In this role, you will take a leading part in managing and optimizing online commercial campaigns across global, regional, and local markets using platforms such as Salesforce Commerce Cloud and Contentful. You will work closely with content teams, marketing managers, and CRM specialists to ensure that commercial strategies are executed effectively, with the goal of increasing online sales and brand visibility.
  
Key Qualifications
  
We are looking for a proactive, detail-oriented individual with strong project management skills who can handle multiple tasks simultaneously. The ideal candidate will have excellent problem-solving and analytical abilities, along with strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.
  
Responsibilities
  
* Develop, manage, and oversee commercial eCommerce campaigns for both B2C and B2B markets, ensuring consistency while adjusting for localization.• Collaborate with the paid media and CRM teams to align marketing strategies and campaign execution.• Monitor and evaluate campaign performance, providing actionable insights for optimization.• Conduct A/B tests and analyze user behavior to improve the online shopping experience.• Set and uphold best practices for global campaign structures within Salesforce Commerce Cloud.• Keep up to date with industry trends and competitor activities to maintain a competitive advantage.


Requirements
  
* 4+ years of experience in online merchandising for global brands operating in multiple markets with multi-market eCommerce operations• Hands-on experience with Salesforce Commerce Cloud.• Proficiency in using Contentful or similar CMS platforms for content management and campaign execution.• Strong knowledge of eCommerce platforms, digital marketing tools, and analytics.• Excellent organizational skills with the ability to streamline projects and encourage teamwork.• A positive attitude, great attention to detail, and problem-solving mindset.Start Date and ApplicationStart Date: As soon as possibleEnd Date: 6 monthsDeadline: ASAPWorkload: Full-time (100%)Location: Stockholm


**Contact person:** 0790 062 711
  
Sway Sourcing is an innovative recruitment partner specializing in quickly and efficiently matching the right talent with the right company. Our core focus areas are Finance, Administration, HR, Marketing, and IT. However, we also have the broad expertise and flexibility required to deliver tailored recruitment solutions across all industries.
  
Although we are a relatively new player, we have already gained the trust of some of Sweden’s largest companies and operate both nationally and internationally. With offices in Sweden and Spain, we offer a unique combination of local expertise and global reach. Our strong network and deep industry insights make us a natural partner for companies looking to stay ahead in their recruitment efforts.

title: Backend/Fullstack Engineer - Security & Anti-Cheat
description:
As a Backend Engineer in the Security team at Embark, you will be an integral part of a highly creative game team focused on building data infrastructure, backend components, and tools to power our anti-cheat efforts.
  
You will play an important role in securing the success of Embark by enabling the effective execution of our various preventive and detective anti-cheat operations. You’ll be part of a small and passionate team with an end-to-end mission; to ensure a fair and fun experience for our players. You’ll collaborate with the rest of the game teams and studio to understand and educate about the anti-cheat perspective.
  
The anti-cheat tools and infrastructure span over several services, UIs and technologies, and as such you will be expected to work independently across different domains and disciplines to solve the problems at hand, learning as you go. This is likely something you enjoy.
  
Some examples of things we’re working on are analytic tools, detection rules, and telemetry infrastructure, authentication. Some of the technologies we use to make all of those are Go, Python, SQL, C++, GCP, Bazel, Terraform, Kubernetes, BigQuery, Google Spanner.
  
Example of responsibilities
  
Collaborate and work closely with fellow software engineers and game developers
  
Build and improve services, features and tools for anti-cheat operations
  
Continuously improve our engineering practices and automate existing workflows to make sure our services are easy to deploy, scale and maintain
  
Make sure your code adds a great amount of value to your colleagues
  
  

We would love if you have
  
A creative and curious mind
  
Solid experience with the technologies we use such as Go, Python, SQL and the GCP stack
  
Experience building frontends and backends, mainly internal data-driven tools
  
Experience deploying and maintaining services on a cloud infrastructure
  
An analytical mindset, self-drive and a can-do attitude to drive projects from idea to product
  
Background in the gaming industry or other consumer-facing products
  
A passion for games, interactive experiences and new technologies
  
Professional English communication skills.
  
  

At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!If this role doesn't quite match what you're looking for, feel free to apply to us via our "Open Application."

title: 1st Line Support Agent (English and Spanish speaking)
description:
The company has developed a groundbreaking cloud service for transportation companies. They have customers all over the world.
  
They are experiencing strong demand of their product and because of that they need to strengthen their 1st line support team with a Spanish and English speaking support agent.
  
This position is in Linköping and you need to work from the office.
  
  

About you
  
* You have excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to think “outside the box”.
* You possess great computing skills and are interested in all things technical.
* You provide a high level of customer service and have a full understanding of its importance.
* You are a curious and fast learner.
* You communicate clearly in English and Spanish, both verbally and in writing.


This is considered an entry-level position and although we don’t believe that you need specific qualifications to succeed in this role, it is very important that you are interested in tech, and have a basic understanding of computing, cloud-based services, and mobile technology.
  
  

About the position
  
As a 1st line support agent, no two days will look the same.
  
Your daily focus will be to help our customers through phone, web chat and email.
  
You will help our customers solving their problems and making sure they have the correct settings on their account.
  
Over time, you will become an expert in the system and point of contact for anyone internally, you’ll be providing operational and technical support to teams across all of our departments.
  
The working hours will be normal office hours, Monday to Friday.
  
  

Your daily tasks will include
  
* Help the customers through phone, web chat and email, to make sure the customers can use the system the way they want it to work.
* Supporting the sales teams in sales demos and general technical support.


It will be considered an advantage if
  
* You speak additional languages, especially Swedish, Finnish, or French.
* You have experience in technical support, ideally in an international environment.


For this position you need to already have a Swedish work permit.

title: Lösniningsarkitekt inom mjukvaruutveckling
description:
*Vill du ta ditt konsultande till nästa nivå hos en av Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare? Vi vet vad du tänker. Du har hört det förut. Men tro oss, det har du inte. Vårt körsbär på konsulttårtan är något annat. Sök jobbet och smaka själv!*

**Rollen**


Som Lösningsarkitekt inom mjukvaruutveckling kommer du att inneha en central roll i att definiera och skapa övergripande tekniska lösningar för komplexa mjukvaruprojekt. Du kommer att arbeta nära företagets ledning och teknikteam för att utforma arkitekturen och säkerställa att mjukvarusystemen uppfyller företagets strategiska mål och tekniska krav. Som nyckelperson kommer du att säkerställa att tekniska lösningar stödjer företagets mål och att systemarkitekturen är stabil, skalbar och säker. Du kommer att vägleda teknikteam och säkerställa att projekt levereras med hög kvalitet och enligt tekniska riktlinjer.

**Erfarenhet**


Du har en stark bakgrund inom mjukvaruutveckling samt arkitekturarbete i agila utvecklingsprocesser och har fördelaktigt moderniserat mjukvarulösningar förr.  

Vi ser även att du har:  

  



* Bakgrund inom utvecklin med erfarenhet av exempelvis Java, Python samt diverse ramverk
* Förmåga att förstå och översätta företagets strategiska mål till tekniska krav och lösningar.
* Design av systemarkitekturer med hänsyn till skalbarhet, prestanda och säkerhet
* Skapande av tekniska specifikationer och arkitekturdokumentation.
* Erfarenhet av molnbaserad arkitektur och tjänster som AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud.
* Kunskap containerteknik som Docker och Kubernetes
* Förståelse för säkerhetsaspekter inom mjukvaruarkitektur och datahantering.

  

Därtill är det av stor vikt att du besitter goda kommunikationsfärdigeter då arbetet ske i nära samverkan med såväl teknikteam som intressenter. Vi ser även att du är genuint intresserad av att upprätthållande kunskap om den senaste teknikutvecklingen inom mjukvaruutveckling och arkitektur.


**Varför ska du välja oss?**


Här tror vi på frihet, möjligheter och medbestämmande. Att du som medarbetare ska ha möjlighet att utvecklas och forma ditt arbete utefter dina intressen och prioriteringar i livet. Att alla får vara med och forma och påverka bolaget genom delägarskap, advisory board och projektgrupper. Att det är viktigt att ha ett sammanhang, känna tillhörighet och att man har kollegor som stöttar, utvecklar och tror på en.

**Om Castra**


Castra är en entreprenörsdriven konsultgrupp inom IT, management och systemutveckling. Bolaget ägs gemensamt av medarbetarna och tillsammans bygger vi det företag vi själva vill jobba på.


Vår vision är att vi ska vara Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare för konsulter. Att vi blivit certifierade av Great Place to Work fem år i rad är ett bevis på våra höga mål kring företagskultur. Våra tankar om delaktighet, påverkansmöjligheter och respekt för individens egna val och möjligheter fungerar.


Företaget har kontor i Göteborg, Stockholm, Helsingborg, Sundsvall, Malmö, Linköping, Norrköping, Örebro och Jönköping. Mer information om Castra-koncernen hittar du på vår hemsida www.castra.se.

**Har vi lyckats väcka din nyfikenhet?** Sök direkt via länken eller kontakta Charlotta.Ljung@castra.se Tfn: 072-871 63 12

title: Data Architect (New York, USA)
description:
Our client is currently seeking an experienced Data Architect to oversee the design, development, and evolution of their data landscape. The successful candidate will be a key contributor to the development of the data architecture, bridging the gap between engineering and business needs.


Responsibilities:

* Define, document, and maintain the overall architecture of the client's data ecosystem, including data models, data flows, and data governance policies
* Collaborate closely with partners across the organisation to ensure alignment on architecture decisions
* Develop and maintain logical data models that accurately represent the company's data assets
* Design and implement data governance frameworks and standards
* Conduct and present regular reviews, assessments and findings of the existing data architecture, identifying areas for improvement and optimisation as part of the continuous improvement plan
* Build and maintain comprehensive documentation for all data assets and processes
* Develop ETL/ELT processes/frameworks to ingest, transform, and load data from various sources into the data warehouse
* Lead and participate in the migration of data and applications from one cloud environment to another.

  

Criteria:

* Proven experience with cloud platforms, preferably GCP and including Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, coupled with migrating between cloud platforms
* Expertise in designing and implementing data pipelines using tools such as Apache Airflow, Google Big Query, Python, and Kubernetes
* Proficient in SQL with at least one scripting language (e.g., Python, Scala)
* Experience with data modelling techniques (e.g., dimensional modelling, snowflake schema).
* Proven knowledge in database fundamentals and enterprise data modelling
* Proven experience in data governance and compliance regulations
* Experience with data visualisation tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
* Experience with containerisation technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)

title: Cloudutvecklare till medarbetarägt konsultbolag!
description:
*På TechSeed är vi övertygade om att det är tekniken som kommer göra världen till en bättre plats. Vi ser ett stort behov i vårt samhälle att kombinera affärsförståelse, digitalt ledarskap samt innovativa arbetssätt och lösningar med framtidens tekniker i uppkopplade ekosystem. Vi tror på en hållbar framtid med säkra lösningar genom exempelvis IoT-lösningar, digitala tvillingar, AI och cybersäkerhet. Det här är vårt WHY och det fyller oss med energi varje dag. Det här är vår arena.*


TechSeed är ett medarbetarägt bolag som erbjuder konsulttjänster och har ett kompetensdjup inom flera domäner. Vi är på en kraftig tillväxtresa och söker nu **utvecklare** som även kommer få en stor grad av inflytande och insyn i hur vi växer framåt och tar ett helhetsgrepp om uppkopplade ekosystem och lösningar. Vi söker dig som trivs i konsultrollen och samtidigt vill bidra till att skapa vägen framåt för TechSeed – Tillsammans.


I denna roll kommer du vara del av ett team som fokuserar på Integration och Cloud, där vi är i en spännande uppstartsfas. I rollen som utvecklare kommer du arbeta som konsult i samarbete med våra kunder. Vi kommer samarbeta för att hitta lämpliga uppdrag och anpassa både uppdrag och roll utifrån dina intressen och din bakgrund. Ditt team tillhör enheten **TechSeed Hyperautomation** som specialiserar sig inom arkitektur, integration, automation och projektledning. Enhetens vision och uppdrag är att sammanlänka olika delar av organisationer och tekniker för att minska manuella metoder som kräver mycket tid och resurser. Deras tjänster inkluderar RPA, BPA, traditionella integrationer och APIer, AI, ML, Computer vision och low code-lösningar.


Enheten präglas av en stark förmåga att bygga strukturer och se sammanhang och en stark sammanhållning. Som delägare och anställd kommer du vara med i utvecklingen av våra erbjudanden, få möjlighet att påverka de områden som du drivs av och samtidigt få tryggheten av ett team med gemensamt mål och gemensamma intressen.


Vår grund ligger i att vi delar med oss av vår passion för teknik och värdet vi skapar. Det handlar bland annat om kunskapsutbyte och att dela idéer, bidra med god stämning såväl som att skapa värde genom vårt delägarskap. Vi erbjuder dig:

  

* Inflytande i hur vi bygger TechSeed tillsammans
* En öppen kultur där vi värdesätter olikheter, insikter och innovationer
* Direkt värde från våra finansiella resultat genom bonus och delägarskap
* Möjligheten att växa in i olika tekniska områden / ansvarsområden utifrån dina önskemål
* Flexibelt arbete hemifrån, beroende på uppdragets behov.

**Vem söker vi?**


Vi söker dig vars expertis är utveckling! Vi söker dig som är nyfiken på ny teknik, trivs i roller där du utvecklas och trivs i en kultur där vi hjälps åt och bygger bolaget **tillsammans**. För att trivas behöver du vara bekväm i rollen som utvecklare och ha minst 5 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet. Vi söker dig som har:

* God förståelse för cloudtekniker, cloudarkitektur och utveckling av mikrotjänster i antingen AWS eller Azure
* Goda kunskaper inom containers (Docker, Kubernetes)
* Din styrka i Java eller C#
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD pipelines, IaC (Terraform, CloudFormation)
* Erfarenhet av API och integration
* Trivs i en miljö som präglas av samarbete och gemensamma mål


Eftersom vi arbetar med flera typer av kunder med olika behov krävs det för rollen att vara obehindrad i både svenska och engelska, tal och skrift. Det är även meriterande om du har erfarenhet inom automotive, erfarenhet som konsult eller av ScaleUp-miljöer.

 **Om TechSeed**


Vi är ett medarbetarägt konsultbolag i ScaleUp-fasen med visionen att skapa värde med uppkopplade lösningar. Vi tror på kombinationen av nära samarbeten, framtidens tekniker och att gemensamt arbeta för att skapa ett bolag vi verkligen trivs på. **Genom att erbjuda delägarskap till våra anställda ger vi möjligheten till insyn och påverkan, samtidigt som det gynnar samarbeten och att prioritera vad som är bäst för gruppen**. Detta speglas både i vår kultur och våra erbjudanden, där vi kombinerar vårt stora tekniska intresse med ett kundanpassat förhållningssätt samtidigt som vi har många sociala aktiviteter och en härlig gemenskap på kontoret. Vår arena är uppkopplade ekosystem, där tekniker som IoT och Intelligent Edge används för att skapa uppkopplade tjänster och system inom ekosystem som Smart Cities, Smart Factories, Smart Companies och Smart Buildings.
